summary: This document includes a notice of change in terms regarding a Master Loan and Security Agreement between Fifth Third Bank and Requiro Scientia LLC. It details the adjustment of the interest rate on a promissory note and outlines the terms of the loan agreement, including payment schedules and conditions for default.

persons.name: Natasha Givens
persons.context: Natasha Givens is identified as the Leasing Documentation Specialist at Fifth Third Bank, who signed the notice of change in terms regarding the loan agreement.

persons.name: Requiro Scientia LLC
persons.context: Requiro Scientia LLC is the borrower in the Master Loan and Security Agreement with Fifth Third Bank, promising to pay back a loan of $395,000.

connections.description: Fifth Third Bank is the lender providing a loan to Requiro Scientia LLC under the Master Loan and Security Agreement.

events.title: Master Loan and Security Agreement
events.description: A Master Loan and Security Agreement was executed between Fifth Third Bank and Requiro Scientia LLC, detailing the terms of a loan for $395,000.

events.title: Notice of Change in Terms
events.description: A notice was issued by Fifth Third Bank to adjust the interest rate on the loan from 4.00% to 3.92%.

keyFacts: The interest rate on the loan was adjusted from 4.00% to 3.92%.
The total amount of the promissory note is $395,000.
The loan is secured by collateral as specified in the Loan Agreement.
Payments are to be made in 60 equal monthly installments of $7,274.53.
The maturity date of the loan is February 14, 2019.
